entry.title: Why Animoca Brands Invested More Money Into Axie Infinity Despite $622M Hack
entry.summary: Despite the massive hack and the play-to-earn game’s struggling economy, metaverse investor Animoca Brands remains bullish.

entry.title: US Government Sanctions Russian Bitcoin Miner
entry.summary: The Treasury department added Moscow-based BitRiver to its Specially Designated Nationals list.

entry.title: Binance Changes Twitter Emoji After Original Resembled Swastika—On Hitler's Birthday
entry.summary: Binance's new Twitter emoji needed some more focus group testing.

entry.title: Ireland Preparing to Ban Bitcoin Donations Over Russia Election Interference Fears
entry.summary: The Irish government wants to remove dark money from the election process.

entry.title: Web3 Venture Studio Decent DAO Launches With $10 Million in Funding
entry.summary: Decent DAO is a decentralized venture studio for developing Web3 projects.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Stage Rebound as DeFi Tokens AAVE, LUNA Rally
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum, the two largest cryptocurrencies by market cap, recovered 3% this morning after starting the week in free fall.

entry.title: Daniel Arsham on Making NFT Artwork That is ‘Not Possible’ in the Real World
entry.summary: With his final “Eroding and Reforming” drop out soon, Arsham discusses his Ethereum NFT work and excitement for the metaverse.

entry.title: Coinbase’s Ethereum NFT Marketplace Launches in Beta
entry.summary: The long-awaited Coinbase NFT platform is finally live with an initial 0% marketplace fee and social media-like elements.

entry.title: Investors Poured $2.5B Into Crypto Games in Q1 2022: Report
entry.summary: Hype for crypto gaming goes hand in hand with metaverse speculation. A DappRadar report now suggests 2022 will see more growth for the niche.

entry.title: Ethereum’s MakerDAO to Launch on StarkNet, Promises 10x Lower Gas Costs
entry.summary: DeFi "blue chip" project MakerDAO is adding an integration with StarkNet to cut transaction costs and speed up withdrawal times.

entry.title: ApeCoin Hits One Month-High Amid Yuga Labs Metaverse Land Sale Rumors
entry.summary: As speculation around the Otherside metaverse project grows, ApeCoin has soared by 37% over the past day, hitting a one-month high.

entry.title: Pro-Crypto Governors DeSantis and Polis Spar Over Disney and Twitter
entry.summary: Does a Twitter spat between the pro-crypto governors of Colorado and Florida presage a potential 2024 showdown?

entry.title: NBA Announces 'Dynamic' Ethereum NFTs for Playoffs
entry.summary: The 18,000 NBA NFTs have traits that will change based on athlete performance.

entry.title: El Salvador’s Bid for Bitcoin Bonds Sinking as IMF Deal 'Practically Dead': Former Central Bank President
entry.summary: The promise of a Volcano-powered, tax-free city built with Bitcoin-backed bonds may sound exciting, but experts have their doubts.

entry.title: Bitcoin Outflows From Crypto Funds Top $73 Million Amid 'Hawkish' Fed Policy: Report
entry.summary: Month-to-date, Bitcoin outflows now total $196 million.

entry.title: Deadfellaz Ethereum NFT Collection Lands Exclusive Deal with UTA
entry.summary: Deadfellaz joins CryptoPunks, Meebits, and Autoglyphs on UTA’s growing roster of digital talent.

entry.title: Bitcoin Is Trading Like a Tech Stock, Not 'Digital Gold'
entry.summary: BTC's 30-day correlation with the Nasdaq is at its highest level since July 2020. Its correlation with gold is at a low point.

entry.title: First Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs to Debut in Australia
entry.summary: U.S. investors are still waiting for the SEC to approve a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund.

entry.title: IMF Warns Russia Could Use Bitcoin Mining to Evade Sanctions
entry.summary: Russia has significant energy resources to put toward cryptocurrency mining, according to the report.

entry.title: Framework Ventures to Invest Half of New $400 Million Fund in Blockchain Gaming
entry.summary: The San Francisco-based firm, which now manages $1.4 billion in assets, also plans to continue investing in DeFi and Web3.

entry.title: How DAOs Have Evolved—And What’s Next
entry.summary: Decentralized autonomous organizations are changing how we collaborate—but to realize their potential they need to become easier to set up and use.

entry.title: Coinbase Chief Legal Officer: SEC Exchange Definition ‘Just Doesn’t Work’
entry.summary: Coinbase said in its comment letter that the SEC “contains no such discussion” of how its new exchange rule will impact DeFi.

entry.title: Solana DeFi Platform Hedge Raises $3.7 Million to Offer Interest-Free Loans
entry.summary: DeFi platform Hedge has attracted investors who see a bright future for the Solana blockchain.

entry.title: Jack Dorsey: Ethereum Has 'Many Single Points of Failure'
entry.summary: Block CEO Jack Dorsey has laid into Ethereum before, but this is the first time he's shared his criticisms of the number two crypto network.

entry.title: Okcoin Is the Latest Exchange to Announce NFT Marketplace
entry.summary: Today, the new marketplace opens its waitlist and says it will come with zero fees for NFTs on Ethereum, Polygon, and other blockchains.

entry.title: Blizzard President: World of Warcraft Publisher Isn't 'Doing NFTs'
entry.summary: Blizzard said no to NFTs for now, although the company is currently getting acquired by Microsoft as part of the latter's metaverse pivot.

entry.title: U.S. Government Issues Alert on Malicious North Korean Crypto Activity
entry.summary: The United States government has released a cybersecurity advisory on North Korean state-sponsored activity in the crypto space.

entry.title: Terra’s LUNA Soars 17% Amid Wider Crypto Market Recovery
entry.summary: LUNA is significantly outperforming the broader crypto market following a massive surge, reclaiming the 8th spot in the rankings.

entry.title: 13 Biggest DeFi Hacks and Heists
entry.summary: There's a lot of money flowing into DeFi. And thanks to hacks and exploits, there's sometimes a lot of money flowing out, too.

entry.title: Kevin O’Leary-Backed DeFi Platform WonderFi to Acquire Coinberry for $38M
entry.summary: The deal comes on the heels of the $162 million acquisition of First Ledger Corp., Bitbuy’s parent company.

entry.title: Ethereum DeFi Protocol Beanstalk Hacked for $182 Million—What You Need to Know
entry.summary: Beanstalk got jacked by a giant flash attack.

entry.title: Kevin Rose’s Moonbirds Ethereum NFT Launch Generates $280M in Two Days
entry.summary: The PROOF Collective’s NFT drop puts up head-turning numbers as the profile picture project finds a ravenous audience.

entry.title: How to Calculate Cost Basis for Crypto Taxes
entry.summary: Before you submit your taxes, make sure you calculate your crypto cost basis.

entry.title: Ethereum Foundation Holds Nearly .3% of All ETH: Report
entry.summary: The foundation spent $21.8 million on layer-one research and development as it prepared for the Ethereum merge.

entry.title: Terra's Stablecoin UST Becomes Crypto's Third-Largest
entry.summary: The dollar-pegged UST has overtaken Binance USD to become the crypto market’s third-largest stablecoin by market capitalization.

entry.title: MetaMask Warns Users of New Apple iCloud Phishing Scam
entry.summary: Crypto wallet MetaMask is ringing the alarm bell on possible phishing scam attacks through Apple’s iCloud service.

entry.title: Greenidge Faces ‘Uphill Battle’ to Renew Bitcoin Mining Permit: Regulator
entry.summary: The Department of Environmental Conservation said Greenidge faces an “uphill battle” in its bid to renew its Bitcoin mining permit.

entry.title: Bitcoin Drops Below $40,000, Ethereum Falls Under $3,000 Yet Again
entry.summary: The two most popular cryptocurrencies have been in a slump for weeks. Today, they've again fallen below $40,000 and $3,000.

entry.title: 'Crypto for Good': Ukrainian Official Shares Photo of New Military Equipment
entry.summary: The nation has received at least $100 million in crypto donations since Russia invaded, according to a recent report.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Elon Musk, Other Billionaires Imagine Transforming Twitter
entry.summary: Elsewhere, Logan Paul announced an NFT project, and Amanda Goetz explained why she no longer attends most crypto events.

entry.title: Astronaut Scott Kelly Discusses NFT Project, Crypto Holdings, and the Metaverse
entry.summary: Retired NASA astronaut Scott Kelly talks to Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward about his new Ethereum NFT collection, which benefits relief efforts in Ukraine, plus the cryptocurrencies he holds and his excitement about the metaverse.

entry.title: Gemini COO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Gemini COO Noah Perlman talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Gemini's approach to competing with other exchanges, its focus on regulatory compliance, and his own views on Bitcoin maximalists.

entry.title: Robinhood Crypto CTO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022
entry.summary: Robinhood Crypto CTO Johann Kerbrat talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Robinhood's new Lightning Network integration, potential NFT plans, and Kerbrat's personal history with crypto, including mining Bitcoin back in 2010.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 7: pplpleasr and the NFT Art Revolution
entry.summary: Emily Yang aka pplpleasr never thought she'd be an online celebrity. But in 2021 an NFT version of a digital ad she did for Uniswap sold for $525,000 to a DAO of her fans, and now she's among the most famous NFT artists. She speaks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the rise of NFT art, the traditional art world taking it seriously, NFT haters, and which NFT marketplaces can beat OpenSea.

entry.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’
entry.summary: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.

entry.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto, Taxes, and You
entry.summary: Tax Day is coming, and the crypto world is paying attention. Decrypt's Jeff Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Adriana Hamacher discuss what people and businesses need to know about crypto and taxes with special guest Nicholas Mowbray of Baker Hostetler.

entry.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: Ditching Big Banks for Bitcoin With Caitlin Long
entry.summary: Caitlin Long spent nearly two decades at big banks Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley before she went all in on Bitcoin. Now her company Custodia is seeking to offer banking services to crypto companies long shut out by the big banks. She talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about identifying as a Bitcoin maximalist, crypto regulation in DC, and Web3 culture.

entry.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022
entry.summary: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."

entry.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help
entry.summary: Tax season is upon us, and crypto investors have questions. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at crypto tax software service Koinly, shares tips in this sponsored segment.

entry.title: Pastel Network's Georgiades: How to Protect Your NFTs
entry.summary: Anthony Georgiades, co-founder of Pastel Network, talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward at Camp Ethereal 2022 about NFT security and the importance of protecting your digital artwork.
